getCodePoint().Description: Returns the illegal code point as defined by @B_java#lang#Character#isValidCodePoint_E@.

IllegalFormatCodePointException(int).Description: Constructs an instance of this class with the specified illegal code point as defined by @B_java#lang#Character#isValidCodePoint_E@.

ClassDesc: Unchecked exception thrown when a character with an invalid Unicode code point as defined by @B_java#lang#Character#isValidCodePoint_E@ is passed to the @B_java#util#Formatter_E@. Unless otherwise specified, passing a @B_java#lang#NullPointerException_E@ to be thrown.
